citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last two semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official had not been signed by a majority of the IACUC. Signatures of
the IACUC members ensure that the report is a reflection of appropriate oversight of the animal care and use program by
the IACUC. The facility must ensure that the reports to the Institutional Official are signed by the IACUC.
Correct from this date forward, 04 February 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The last two semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official had not been signed by a majority of the IACUC. Signatures of 
the IACUC members ensure that the report is a reflection of appropriate oversight of the animal care and use program by 
the IACUC. The facility must ensure that the reports to the Institutional Official are signed by the IACUC. 
 
Correct from this date forward, 04 February 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
